reviews.text:
Great fun to get a little way out of London.
Have always loved trains and nice to see the high speed ones tanking it through the station
I actually got a little confused and got on the fast platform through to Euston so read rhe signage carefully.
Seemed a clean and tidy station but did not see lifts for disabled access
Bit open bet it gets totally freezing there in Winter
Next to Watford Junction that makes it way great to almost all trains

Found myself in a real dilemma today, but was truly blessed this morning by Tejinder. Service and faith over and above by the office staff. 
Many thanks, Love to you both in the name of Jesus!
I always miss the trains but it is very cute😀

reviews.author_name: London Flareon Tokyo Ebisu - Swanslade 恵比寿-スワンズレイド
reviews.text: Bushey is located in the Oxhey section of Watford, the station is served by the Overground and West Midlands Trains, clean and quiet, Bushey is a well used station during rush hour, West Midlands Trains zoom people from place to place quickly and efficiently, same with the Overground, there are plenty of shops and restaurants in the area so there should be plenty to do.
